ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_rainbow] Hello
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I m curious what a large collection means in gay EQ terms.  I keep trying to compare our new guild with the uber-guilds on The Nameless server and of
ygData.messageBody:
>Yes I believe Rodcet is the largest collection of players

I'm curious what a "large collection" means in "gay EQ" terms. I keep trying
to compare our new guild with the uber-guilds on The Nameless server and of
course we come up short. But we usually have around 4 people online, with as
many as 10. Last weekend, I think, we grouped with our guildfriends (The
Nameless of Mercy) at SolA and we had enough people to completely fill 2
party groups. I think that's an exceptional headcount for a guild that's
still less than half a year old.

Cure my feelings of inadequacy as guildleader. Tell me we're doing well on
the "headcount" test. Heh.

- SoulDreamer, Nameless Love guild, The Nameless server
